title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
description: Currently, the setting of classpath and output location is not offered as one operation. It is requested to provide functionality to set classpath and output location together. Additionally, the error message when attempting to nest '/xy/src' in '/xy' should be improved.
EB: The classpath and output location can be set together in a single operation. Also, the error message when attempting to nest '/xy/src' in '/xy' should be more informative.
